text: Cylindrocarpon is a genus of fungi. Many of the species in this genus are plant pathogens. ==Species== *Cylindrocarpon abuense *Cylindrocarpon aequatoriale *Cylindrocarpon amamiense *Cylindrocarpon angustum *Cylindrocarpon aquaticum
